price: 2. Alobaki: Oh bato na ngai! Ya sôló, nazali mokebisi ya polele тропа bino,
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
